citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
Expired oral calcium was observed stored in the building. Per a facility representative it likely inadvertently was brought
into the kennel from another building and used for one adult dog a few weeks ago. Expired medications must not be
stored and used in regulated animals as the medication might not work as intended.
***Correct by 10/2/2023.

Two temporary sheltered enclosures have surfaces such as bare wood walls that aren't impervious to moisture that dogs
could contact. The litters housed in the enclosures are scheduled to be moved tomorrow. Surface that dogs contact must
be impervious to let them be more readily cleaned and sanitized. Ensure that surfaces that dogs and their litters contact
are impervious to moisture and can be readily cleaned and sanitized.
***Correct prior to using these enclosures again.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.40(b)(2) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
Expired oral calcium was observed stored in the building. Per a facility representative it likely inadvertently was brought 
into the kennel from another building and used for one adult dog a few weeks ago. Expired medications must not be 
stored and used in regulated animals as the medication might not work as intended.  
***Correct by 10/2/2023. 
3.3(e)(1)(ii) 
   
Sheltered housing facilities. 
Two temporary sheltered enclosures have surfaces such as bare wood walls that aren't impervious to moisture that dogs 
could contact. The litters housed in the enclosures are scheduled to be moved tomorrow. Surface that dogs contact must 
be impervious to let them be more readily cleaned and sanitized. Ensure that surfaces that dogs and their litters contact 
are impervious to moisture and can be readily cleaned and sanitized.  
***Correct prior to using these enclosures again. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
